title: "Reporting"

## APA-Style Output

### Using the report package

```r
library(report)

model <- lm(score ~ condition, data = data)
report(model)
```

### Formatting numbers

```r
# Round to 2 decimal places
round(0.12345, 2)

# Format p-values
format.pval(0.0001, digits = 3)
```

### Tables with kable

```r
library(knitr)
kable(summary_table, digits = 2)
```
